name: VNB
quoteText: Beyond engaging Tales With Real Substance and Wisdom.
text: I came across this incredible writer and all I can say is THIS is how it’s done! Short stories are certainly not everyone’s cup of words, but many people simply don’t realize how extremely satisfying it is to read a complete story with vivid characters and an engaging plot, all done in a distinctive and well delivered manner . Each story was unique and well written with few of the stories’ ending with a twist I didn't see coming. This is a truly inventive collection of William's short stories and although I enjoyed his other novel too, “Calamitous Fortunes”, I’m hoping that he will publish another book soon. He has a gifted imagination and this collection is definitely one of my favorites.

name: SRH
text: Fully enjoyed the development of each set of characters. I found in a macabre way I was able to relate to them. This is not your ordinary book with ordinary circumstances. The twists are built up in crescendo so that you are unable to leave the story...until that final reveal. And then you get this rush of finality as the story comes to an end. A few of them I wanted to jump up and give a standing ovation.

name: Bruce R. Pfaff
quoteText: Stories that take you on Adventures
text: Each of the stories takes the reader on very different journeys. The voice of the author is clear and truthful; a pleasure to read. I can't wait for more....

name: Riley Lyn
quoteText: Stop Reading Reviews and Read This Book
text: I don't care who you are, what you like, or where you come from... You need to read this book. I promise there is at least one story in this book that will speak to you. For me, it was all ten. Each had a character I related to, a story that I both recognized and did not (in the utmost positive way), and an idea that made me truly think. I wish I could express to you eloquently that you must read this book, but I do not possess the writing skills for this. Mr. Spreadbury does though, so go see for yourself.

name: P.P.
text: William held us captive from beginning to end. Such a unique writing form he masters.

name: Lyn Jor
text: Very good read. Enjoyed each story. Writer knows how to keep you involved and intrigued for the next page, as well as the next story. Looking forward to future reads.

name: Brooke Schuler
text: Does an excellent job of making fictional characters feel like real people. As a fan of short stories, I often find that pieces lack the emotional depth found here. Spreadbury truly has a gift for describing the full spectrum of human feelings. Michael S. 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent read!! Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2018 Verified Purchase Creative, suspenseful writing...the book was a terrific read. Recommended you check out this author....book is fiction but touches on raw, human truths......wonderfully written..

name: Amazon Customer
text: This collection of short stories was the best thing I've read in awhile. The stories are clever, the writing is sharp, and their format is inventive. "The Name of the Book" starts with "Look What Terry Made", a fantastic piece that sets expectations high for the following tales. They do not disappoint. I highly recommend this collection and eagerly await the sequel, Calamitous Fortunes, which is rumored to come out this Winter. Read on!

name: Karen M. Beeze
text: One of the most enjoyable books I've read in a long time. The author did an awesome job of capturing real life situations in a manner that kept me engaged til the end. I will definitely read more of his work if it becomes available.

name: Amazon Customer
quoteText: Buy this book. You will not regret it!
text: Love the stories. Love the writing. I heard this was a very unique and interesting story teller and I was not disappointed!

name: Robert Flynn
text: Not trying to tell you how to live your life but you should buy this book!

name: Kindle Customer
text: This is an excellent book by an up an coming author. It is a great read with twists and turns just at the right times to keep readers on the edge of their seats. You will have a hard time putting it down.

name: TT
text: A friend recommended this book, glad I read it. Interesting characters and great twists.

name: Kindle Customer
text: An excellent read! Looking forward to his next book!

name: ray jarolimek
text: Some very interesting stories. Some are a little hard to follow but worth the effort.

name: zhayer
text: It's the little things in life!

name: Julie M. Jordan
text: Thought provoking, and lots of suspense!
